ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, driver’s ed, bands, relationships, the future, finances, business, education, therapy, getting older, the office, priorities, and doctors.

ComicInfo.Title: Mad’s Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; Goodnight Room; More Contractual Obligations We’d Like to See Some Celebrities Agree to; The Lighter Side of...; What Drives You Mad?; “Instant Ready Keyboard” Commands That Tell it Like It Is; You’re Probably Not Heading to College if…; Monroe and… a Day with Dad; A Mad Look at TV; The Untold History of Mad Magazine
